ValidationRule.description: Ensure activities are added before progressing opportunity from "Propose" to "Negotiate" stage and beyond.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISNEW()), ISCHANGED( StageName ), ISBLANK(LastActivityDate), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Negotiate"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won") ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Add an Activity. Sales tasks and events must be added to provide visibility of your customer interactions and details of your discussions with the customer.
